channel.title: Aufhebung
channel.description: « L'homme est la nature prenant conscience d'elle-même. »

item.title: Test markdown
item.description: Each post also has a subtitle - You can write regular markdown here and Jekyll will automatically convert it to a nice webpage. I strongly encourage you to take 5 minutes to learn how to write in markdown - it’ll teach you how to transform regular text into bold/italics/headings/tables/etc. Here is some bold text Here is a...

item.title: To be
item.description: ... or not to be? - To be, or not to be–that is the question: Whether ‘tis nobler in the mind to suffer The slings and arrows of outrageous fortune Or to take arms against a sea of troubles And by opposing end them. To die, to sleep– No more–and by a sleep to say we...

item.title: Dear diary
item.description: What is it with that Mary girl? Dragging me to school every day. As if I had a choice. What you don’t hear in those nursery rhymes is that she starves me if I don’t go to school with her; it’s the only way I can stay alive! I’m thinking...

item.title: Soccer
item.description: Best sport ever! - From Wikipedia: Association football, more commonly known as football or soccer,[2] is a sport played between two teams of eleven players with a spherical ball. It is played by 250 million players in over 200 countries, making it the world’s most popular sport.[3][4][5][6] The game is played on a rectangular...

item.title: Pirates arrrr
item.description: Piracy is typically an act of robbery or criminal violence at sea. The term can include acts committed on land, in the air, or in other major bodies of water or on a shore. It does not normally include crimes committed against persons traveling on the same vessel as the...

item.title: First post!
item.description: This is my first post, how exciting!

item.title: DE LA MISÈRE EN MILIEU ÉTUDIANT
item.description: Internationale Situationniste - La domination consciente de l’histoire par les hommes qui la font, voilà tout le projet révolutionnaire. L’histoire moderne, comme toute l’histoire passée, est le produit de la praxis sociale, le résultat – inconscient – de toutes les activités humaines. À l’époque de sa domination totalitaire, le capitalisme a produit sa...

item.description: La domination consciente de l’histoire par les hommes qui la font, voilà tout le projet révolutionnaire. L’histoire moderne, comme toute l’histoire passée, est le produit de la praxis sociale, le résultat – inconscient – de toutes les activités humaines.
